name: Lobster
description:
Lobster is a platform which enables brands, agencies and the media to licence visual content directly from social media users. 

Using pioneering AI technology, it trawls through all of the main social networks (Instagram, Flickr, Facebook, Foursquare, Vk, YouTube, Vimeo), along with several of the largest cloud storage providers (Verizon cloud, Dropbox, Google Photos). Billions of affordable images and videos in an instant - live, unusual and so much more authentic than stock.

team.title: CEO & Co-founder
team.name: Olga Egorsheva
team.bioHtml: Co-founder and CEO at Lobster, building the global marketplace for user content.

team.bioHtml: I have always been an attentive, curious and outgoing individual with a drive to apply these qualities to communication, art, culture + tech

jobs.title: Head of Marketing & Growth Hacking
jobs.description:
You drive Lobster's growth through online and offline activities around challenging goals and using innovative techniques! 

Co-create and run our hacking strategy, SEO, social media marketing, content marketing (blogging). Running events for agencies and contributors (photographers). 

Ideal for young professionals in Marketing / Management / PR with 1-3 years of experience and loving startup, tech and creative fields. Looking for someone who is excited by the growth opportunities and creative challenges of working in a digital startup. Previous experience in advertising, media, design, even on the internship level, is a big plus. Very quick learners with excellent English communication skills will be considered. 

Tough growth goals, lean budgets and a dynamic team in London and Moscow. Working with the co-founders and managing a team of 3-5 interns. collaborating closely with our Head of Sales to make sure we attract customers and with the Product Team to make sure we are developing exactly that enjoyable product for the paying side of the marketplace. Starting asap in our office near Soho. 

Please send us: 
- Your CV or LinkedIn 
- Why you think this is a great job for you 
- One or more examples, ideally quantifiable, of your achievements in marketing and growth hacking

jobs.title: Machine Learning / Computer Vision Engineer for a UK Startup in Moscow
jobs.description:
We are seeking a machine learning & computer vision algorithm developer for a UK start-up in our Moscow, Russia offices.  

This is a great opportunity for junior to senior level candidates with excellent mathematics and strong interest in most of the following:

• Machine Learning (TensorFlow, Theano, Keras, Caffe, etc)
• Computer Vision / Image Recognition / AI 
• Programming in C++ / Python, OpenCV
• Search Algorithms 

Other Requirements and Stack Used at Lobster: 

- Ruby on Rails 
- Mongo DB, Databases
- Elastic Search
- AWS 
- Interest to creative tech and media industry 
- Proactive approach to inventing new tech solutions 
- Ability to work under pressure, in a team and individually 


- Central Moscow tech-hub Kl10ch 3 days a week + remote 2 days a week - flexible working in a young team 
- Share options % in the company and fixed contract salary in GBP/RUB 
- Learning and growth within the team 
- Trips to London and other locations for AI conferences 
- Working in a global startup with product ownership and helping us implement the great Lobster vision
